original_text: He came to tell people about the light. God wanted everyone to believe in the one who is the light.
korean_text: 그가 증언하러 왔으니 곧 빛에 대하여 증언하고 모든 사람이 자기로 말미암아 믿게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: He came to tell people about the light
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 빛에 대해 사람들에게 말하려고 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: to believe in the one who is the light
